Topic Modeling with Gensim (Python) - A Practical Guide
excerpt: Topic Modeling is a technique to understand and extract the hidden topics from large volumes of text. Latent Dirichlet Allocation(LDA) is an algorithm for topic modeling, which has excellent implementations in the Python's Gensim package. This tutorial tackles the problem of finding the optimal number of topics.
